alert.note: Alert for Fresno-Tulare Foothills; Fresno-Tulare Lower Sierra; Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Sequoia NP (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 9:24PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL TULARE AND EAST CENTRAL FRESNO COUNTIES THROUGH 1015 PM PDT... At 923 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northwest of Three Rivers, or 24 miles northeast of Visalia, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Three Rivers, Shadequarter Mtn, Grant Grove, Crystal Springs Campground, Pinehurst, Park Ridge, Azalea Campground, Sunset Campground, Hume Lake, Grant Grove Visitor Center, and Squaw Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Fresno-Tulare Foothills; Fresno-Tulare Lower Sierra; Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Sequoia NP
